articles.title: Aussie is baffled over the unusual products stocked in American pharmacies - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ali Clarke, founder of Melbourne brand Bondi Blades, shared her experience in a video - and to her surprise the US pharmacy stocked far more than vitamins, drugs and medical supplies.
articles.content:
An Aussie mum-of-one was lost for words after visiting an American pharmacy for the first time.
